meta.name: Ghosts
meta.description: Samantha and Jay throw caution to the wind when they convert their recently inherited country estate into a bed-and-breakfast. Call it mislaid plans. Not only is the place falling apart, but it's also inhabited by spirits of previous residents -- whom only Samantha can see and hear. Ghosts spins the funny, heartfelt story about a newfound dream that reveals connection and self-discovery aren't just for the living.

videos.title: The Life and Times of Esther Greene
videos.overview: Now a successful podcaster, Todd Pearlman returns to profile Sam and Isaac's book, but becomes obsessed with Jay; Pete tries to get to the bottom of why Alberta changed her name, forcing her to admit a hidden truth.

videos.title: Pilot
videos.overview: Samantha and Jay throw both caution and money to the wind when they decide to convert a rundown country estate they inherited into a bed and breakfast – only to find it's inhabited by the many opinionated spirits of deceased residents who now call it home.

videos.title: Hello!
videos.overview: Sam thinks she's crazy because she sees ghosts and tries to ignore them.

videos.title: Viking Funeral
videos.overview: When Thorfinn's bones are discovered on the property, he asks Sam to conduct the traditional Viking funeral he's always wanted; Sam and Jay are torn when they learn that the bones could be sold to a museum for a lot of much-needed cash.

videos.title: Dinner Party
videos.overview: Sam and Jay invite Henry and Margaret to a dinner party to woo them into allowing the bed and breakfast; the ghosts are desperately eager to be included on the guest list.

videos.title: Halloween
videos.overview: The ghosts try to help Sam and Jay protect their home from the neighborhood kids who annually vandalize the house on Halloween.

videos.title: Pete's Wife
videos.overview: Pete convinces Sam to invite his living wife to the mansion, only to discover she's been keeping a dark secret from him; Sasappis gets angry with Thorfinn for binge-watching their favorite show without him; Trevor learns he may have a daughter.

videos.title: Flower's Article
videos.overview: When Sam is commissioned to write an article about Flower and her friends holding up a bank during their commune days, Flower begs Sam not to accept the job because she's embarrassed about a part of the story she's never revealed.

videos.title: D&D
videos.overview: After Jay is kicked out of a Dungeons & Dragons game with his city friends, Sam agrees to facilitate a new one between him and the ghosts; Isaac confronts his feelings for Nigel, a ghost from whom he's been keeping a gigantic secret.

videos.title: Alberta's Fan
videos.overview: Alberta is thrilled when a super-fan visits the mansion; Thor convinces Hetty to go on a walk that would hopefully spark a special memory.

videos.title: Possession
videos.overview: Hetty accidentally possesses Jay's body just as he and Sam are to about show Woodstone Mansion to a renowned wedding planner.

videos.title: Sam's Mom
videos.overview: Sam and Jay travel to where Sam's mother died to see if she's now a ghost; Sasappis divulges a secret to his fellow ghosts.

videos.title: Jay's Sister
videos.overview: When Jay's sister comes to visit after being dumped by her boyfriend, they're shocked to discover that she's communicating with someone they know on a dating app.

videos.title: The Vault
videos.overview: Just as Sam and Jay are set to host a friend's wedding that could get their bed-and-breakfast business off the ground, the ghost of Hetty's husband tries to ruin it.

videos.title: Ghostwriter
videos.overview: Sasappis offers to help Sam complete the bed and breakfast website so they can start taking reservations; Pete bonds with Jay over basketball, until Jay makes a new living friend; Flower attempts to be Pete's new basketball buddy.

videos.title: Thorapy
videos.overview: When Sam and Jay have the ghosts bunk together to free up rooms for guests at the bed-and-breakfast, they learn that Thorfinn has been having night terrors, which inspires Sam to enlist a therapist to help him.

videos.title: Trevor's Pants
videos.overview: The secret about Trevor's missing pants is finally revealed when his wealthy former friend comes to Woodstone Mansion to buy the timepiece Sam and Jay found on Elias Woodstone's corpse; Thor decides to tell Flower how he feels about her.

videos.title: Attic Girl
videos.overview: An '80s "mean girl" ghost named Stephanie, who died on her prom night, is awakened in the attic, triggering Sam to confront what happened on her own prom night; Alberta discovers she has another special gift.

videos.title: Farnsby & B
videos.overview: As Sam and Jay await the arrival of their first official bed-and-breakfast guests, they face obstacles triggered by a Norse curse placed upon them by Thorfinn; Isaac takes a huge, centuries-in-the-making step in his personal life.

videos.title: Spies
videos.overview: Sam enlists the ghosts to help secure a good review from an overly critical couple staying at the bed-and-breakfast; Isaac tries to integrate Nigel into his friend group.

videos.title: Alberta's Podcast
videos.overview: Sam decides to host a podcast exploring the mystery surrounding Alberta's death; Hetty develops an unusual relationship with a broken washing machine.

videos.title: Jay's Friends
videos.overview: Sam becomes alarmed when the ghosts suggest Jay's new friends may be part of a cult run by a charismatic leader named Micah; Pete changes his attitude after Sasappis criticizes his unceasing cheerfulness.

videos.title: The Tree
videos.overview: Sasappis convinces Sam and Jay to try and save an old tree on the Woodstone property that the neighbors want to cut down; Thor attempts to become more environmentally friendly to get Flower's attention.

videos.title: Halloween 2: The Ghost of Hetty's Past
videos.overview: A séance at Sam and Jay's last-minute Halloween party conjures up a spirit from Hetty's past; Isaac worries Nigel will be turned off by his ghost power.

videos.title: The Baby Bjorn
videos.overview: Sam meets a Viking ghost at the Farnsbys' house who has an unexpected connection to Thorfinn; Trevor devises a new method for the ghosts to trade favors.

videos.title: Dumb Deaths
videos.overview: When a TV documentary crew comes to Woodstone Mansion to shoot an episode of "Dumb Deaths"; Pete confronts a hard truth about the day he died.

videos.title: The Liquor License
videos.overview: Alberta's expertise from her past comes in handy when Sam and Jay run into some complications during their Woodstone whiskey tasting soiree; Trevor devises a ghost fraternity, which inspires a revelation from Isaac's past.

videos.title: The Christmas Spirit, Part One
videos.overview: When Jay's sister Bela returns to Woodstone Mansion for a holiday visit and brings a male friend, Samantha makes it her mission to spark a holiday romance between them.

videos.title: The Christmas Spirit, Part Two
videos.overview: Sam and Thorfinn get caught in the crossfire as the scheme Jay's sister and the ghosts conjure up goes awry; Isaac's marriage to Beatrice sheds light on how apprehensive he has been in communicating his feelings to Nigel.

videos.title: The Perfect Assistant
videos.overview: Sam and Jay are thrilled when they find a highly qualified assistant, but their new employee comes with some surprising baggage; Thorfinn tries to help his son deal with a bully.

videos.title: The Family Business
videos.overview: Sam gives relationship advice to her and Jay's assistant, Freddie, ignoring Hetty's warning not to get too close to "the help"; Sasappis strikes up a romance with Jessica, the ghost who lives in Freddie's car.

videos.title: Ghost Hunter
videos.overview: Sam and Jay's assistant, Freddie, purchase ghost-hunting equipment when suspicious activity leads him to theorize the bed-and-breakfast is haunted; Sasappis risks losing his relationship with Jessica when Freddie sells his car.

videos.title: Trevor's Body
videos.overview: Trevor receives disturbing news about his parents when they come to collect his newly discovered remains; Isaac and Nigel's relationship hits a roadblock.

videos.title: A Date to Remember
videos.overview: Sam and Jay help Thorfinn create a perfect first date with Flower; Hetty feels slighted by the ghosts' new housemate, Nigel.

videos.title: Isaac's Book
videos.overview: Sam struggles to keep Isaac's spirits up after she hits a wall trying to publish a biography about him; Trevor and Hetty conspire to keep their relationship hidden; Thor tries to prove to Flower that he can control his anger.

videos.title: Weekend from Hell
videos.overview: Elias Woodstone returns to Woodstone seeking Hetty's forgiveness so he can stay out of hell for good; Jay struggles to repeat an inspired culinary creation that he came up with after walking through Flower.

videos.title: Alberta's Descendant
videos.overview: Alberta is thrilled when a living relative, Alicia, visits Woodstone to learn more about her; Nigel uses his knowledge of Trevor and Hetty's secret tryst to try to blackmail Hetty.

videos.title: Ghost Father of the Bride
videos.overview: After learning that Pete's daughter, Laura, is getting married, Sam, at Pete's behest, tries to convince her to hold her wedding at the Woodstone bed-and-breakfast; Alberta and Isaac team up to solve the mystery of what happened to Crash's head.

videos.title: Woodstone's Hottest Couple
videos.overview: When teen ghost Stephanie, who lives in the attic, awakens to find that her crush, Trevor, is now dating Hetty, she decides to sabotage all of the relationships at Woodstone.

videos.title: Whodunnit
videos.overview: Sam, Jay and the ghosts go into detective mode when Sam's podcast editor gives her one last episode to wrap up Alberta's murder; Trevor, Flower and Pete discover an email from a Nigerian prince asking for help.

videos.title: The Heir
videos.overview: When a woman shows up claiming to be the rightful heir to Woodstone Mansion, Sam and Jay enlist the help of a lawyer; Isaac tries to decide how to spend half of Sam's advance on his autobiography; an event could dramatically change life at the manor.

videos.title: The Owl
videos.overview: Sam, Jay and the remaining ghosts unravel the mystery of which ghost passed into the afterlife; Sam and Jay must relocate an owl to do construction on the barn to turn it into Jay's restaurant.

videos.title: Man of Your Dreams
videos.overview: Sam learns that one of the ghosts' powers is to enter the dreams of the living and influence their decisions; two of the ghosts think they've learned the secret to moving on.

videos.title: He Sees Dead People
videos.overview: When Jay's sister and her boyfriend visit Woodstone Mansion, Eric reveals a major change that took place after his near-death experience there over Christmas.

videos.title: Halloween 3: The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave
videos.overview: Pete's ex-wife, Carol, shows up at Woodstone Mansion during Sam and Jay's Halloween party, where they're trying to impress some cool friends; the ghosts hope to bring Flower back with a seance.

videos.title: The Silent Partner
videos.overview: A big investor backs out of Sam and Jay's restaurant, leaving them to turn to the one ghost who has money -- Isaac.

videos.title: Hello, Brother
videos.overview: Trevor's brother, Jeremy, checks into Woodstone after discovering a loophole in the Woodstone Rewards Points program.

videos.title: The Polterguest
videos.overview: Alberta hits it off with a poltergeist who is attached to a newly arrived Woodstone guest; Isaac and Nigel have separate bachelor parties.

videos.title: Holes Are Bad
videos.overview: When Sam and Jay leave the ghosts home alone for the weekend in an attempt to have a romantic getaway, shocking revelations are made about two of Woodstone's beloved spirits.

videos.title: The Traveling Agent
videos.overview: Pete discovers a power that he never knew he had, one that brings him closer to his buddy Jay.

videos.title: Isaac's Wedding
videos.overview: Isaac's wedding day jitters are exacerbated by the arrival of a surprise guest.

videos.title: Patience
videos.overview: While Sam and the ghosts race to find him, Isaac comes face to face with Puritan ghost Patience for the first time since she was lost in the dirt.

videos.title: Sam's Dad
videos.overview: When Sam's dad comes to Woodstone for a visit, Patience puts their father-daughter relationship to the test; Isaac must deal with the fallout from his breakup with Nigel; Thor and Flower handle an awkward situation with Nancy.

videos.title: Halloween 4: The Witch
videos.overview: The ghosts, seeking some excitement during a low-key Halloween, join Patience in putting Sam on a witch trial.

videos.title: The Work Retreat
videos.overview: Trevor, who has catfished his way into a remote financial analyst job, is in hot water when he's summoned to a mandatory in-person work retreat; Hetty and Sass start a rumor about Pete.

videos.title: A Star Is Dead
videos.overview: Alberta offers to help Sam prepare for an audition for a community theater production; Sass finds a new reason to interfere in Jay's dreams.

videos.title: The Primary Source
videos.overview: When Sam's book publisher requires source material for her biography on Isaac, she and Jay take a field trip to find a diary he claims he hid when he was alive.

videos.title: Sad Farnsby
videos.overview: When Sam accidentally creates a rift between Sam and Jay's neighbors, the Farnsbys, Henry Farnsby moves into Woodstone B&B; Isaac and Nigel battle over a belated wedding present.

videos.title: A Very Arondekar Christmas Part 1
videos.overview: A leaky water heater mishap threatens to ruin holiday plans as Sam and Jay prepare to host Jay's hard-to-please dad, difficult-to-impress mom and sister Bela.

videos.title: A Very Arondekar Christmas Part 2
videos.overview: A leaky water heater mishap threatens to ruin holiday plans as Sam and Jay prepare to host Jay's hard-to-please dad, difficult-to-impress mom and sister Bela.

videos.title: The Not-So-Silent Partner
videos.overview: Sam and Jay are forced to cover when Mark demands to meet the silent investor in Jay's restaurant who has been holding up construction.

videos.title: Thorapy 2: Abandonment Issues
videos.overview: Thor returns to therapy to work through his angst over being abandoned by his Viking shipmates. Also, Jay's sister, Bela, attempts to help him with the restaurant.

videos.title: It's the End of the World as We Know It and What Were We Talking About?
videos.overview: Flower interferes with the opening of Jay's restaurant based on a prophecy from her old cult leader.

videos.title: Ghostfellas
videos.overview: Jay angers a local restaurateur when he uses a recipe at his restaurant that was given to him by Pete.

videos.title: Alexander Hamilton and the Ruffle Kerfuffle
videos.overview: When Jay becomes obsessed with the success of a fellow chef, Isaac serves up a cautionary tale about his own rivalry with Alexander Hamilton. Also, Elias Woodstone returns from hell with a limited-time offer for the ghosts.

videos.title: The Bachelorette Party
videos.overview: When Alberta's descendant hosts a bachelorette party at Woodstone Mansion, Alberta becomes suspicious of her fiancé. Also, Jay is excited about a positive review on his restaurant.

videos.title: St. Hetty's Day
videos.overview: Hetty's ghost power is revealed when Jay's cousin Sunil visits Woodstone Mansion on St. Patrick's Day.

videos.title: His Girl Shiki
videos.overview: Pete makes good on his promise to find someone for Sasappis by bringing in a wisecracking 1940s screenwriter who also has the ability to roam.

videos.title: Smooching and Smushing
videos.overview: Jay, Sam and the ghosts attempt to fix the ghost trap in hopes of getting Sasappis across the ghost boundary to visit his longtime crush, Shiki.

videos.title: Pinkus Returns
videos.overview: When Trevor's former co-worker, Pinkus, and his daughter, Abby, show up at Woodstone Mansion, Trevor gets the surprise of his afterlife.

videos.title: I Know What You Did Thirty-Seven Summers Ago
videos.overview: When Sam and Jay host a fundraiser for the mayor to earn a favor for Jay's restaurant, they learn of his bizarre connection to one of Woodstone's ghosts.

videos.title: Kyle
videos.overview: Sam and Jay's relationship is tested when Kyle, a handsome living who shares Sam's ability to see ghosts, arrives at Woodstone B&B.

videos.title: The Devil Went Down to Woodstone
videos.overview: Sam and Jay host a big party for the launch of Sam and Isaac's vampire book.

videos.title: Soul Custody
videos.overview: Sam, Jay and the ghosts attempt to extricate Jay from his deal with Elias Woodstone, the devil; Isaac helps Patience through a crisis of confidence; Pete and Alberta navigate the fallout from their kiss.

videos.title: Viking Wedding
videos.overview: Sam and Jay try to impress their trendy city friends; a misplaced bookcase threatens Thor's ability to deliver an important speech; Isaac rallies the ghosts to help the couple navigate a tough customer service ordeal.

videos.title: Halloween 5: The Mummy
videos.overview: Sam and Jay's Halloween takes a spooky turn when they accidentally unleash a mummy ghost.

videos.title: Bring Your Daughter to Work Day
videos.overview: Trevor finds a way to spend more time with his newly discovered daughter, Abby, by getting her at job at Jay's restaurant.

videos.title: T Daddy
videos.overview: Trevor's relationship with his daughter is strained when he pushes her to follow a career in finance over poetry; Jay confronts labor unrest at the restaurant.

videos.title: Planes, Shanes and Automobiles
videos.overview: Sam and Pete get on each other's nerves during a book tour road trip; things reach a breaking point when an airline strike threatens their ability to get home in time for Thanksgiving.

videos.title: The Proposal
videos.overview: Sam helps Eric plan the perfect proposal for Bela, until an encounter with Sasappis plants doubt in Bela's mind.

videos.title: The Life and Times of Esther Greene
videos.overview: Now a successful podcaster, Todd Pearlman returns to profile Sam and Isaac's book, but becomes obsessed with Jay; Pete tries to get to the bottom of why Alberta changed her name, forcing her to admit a hidden truth.
